author: costin
msg: Various fixes in tests:
- 404/403 fixed to match what tomcat returns
- removed tests where we return HTTP0.9 error messages ( tests
checked for HTTP/1.0 )
- Failing tests will print what they expected and what they get (
backport from main branch )
- Fixed "connection reset" problem on Linux ( from main branch )
Also, a small fix in ServerRequest's handling of 0.9.

author: akv
msg: Broken link fixed. Need to add more links in foo.html to the Tag handler
sources and such...

author: akv
msg: There was two instance vars in javax....TagAttributeInfo for the same thing -- one
called reqTime and one called rtexprvalue and one was used for set and the other one
for get. (I have discussed this bug with Eduardo.)

author: gonzo
msg: order the "load on startup" servlet keys - j2ee

author: costin
msg: Removed RequestImpl, Request is back to its original
form.
The interface to be implemented by Server Adapters is
RequestAdapter.
Changing Request to an interface didn't worked - Request
is used internaly in many places, so removing methods
is too difficult, and in general, Request serve a different
purpose and needs all the extra methods.
RequestAdapter will be "pluged-in" as soon as I finish
converting existing adapters to implement the new interface.
